page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: THIS BLOCK WAS SURVEYED BY THE JOINT EFFORTS OF THE CHILDREN AND THEIR TEACHERS IN EIGHT LOCAL SCHOOLS. IT WAS A MAJOR TASK TO SUCCESSFULLY CONCLUDE THIS AT A TIME WHEN SCHOOLS WERE DISRUPTED BY BAD WEATHER, TEACHERS IN DISPUTE WITH EMPLOYERS AND A CHANGE TO A SYSTEM OF MIDDLE SCHOOLS IN THIS PART OF CRAWLEY. SCHOOLS INVOLVED WERE: {*}HOLY TRINITY (SECONDARY) {*}HOLY CROSS INTERMEDIATE (MIDDLE) {*}BEWBUSH (MIDDLE) {*}SOUTHGATE WEST (MIDDLE) {*}LANGLEY GREEN (JUNIOR) {*}IFIELD (JUNIOR) {*}GOSSOPS GREEN (JUNIOR) {*}ST. FRANCIS (FIRST) Many individuals in and out of schools deserve special thanks. {Data entry was completed in Holy {Trinity School by Roger Nash.
